name: EscapeForever
description:
Escape for ever. 
The idea is simple you are stuck in an area where things are for some reason always repeating them-self and all you can do is again and again trying to escape. 

The idea was to keep things minimalist and simple it was us trying to check how to make a run time navmesh and also make something that is simple and looks good. the AI is also pretty simple they cannot see you but if you are in their area you do die.
